column4: Hey chaps, just done a fresh install on a maters puter, everything working fine except for xine. Xine is looking for /dev/dvd, but the device is at scd0. A symbolic link in /dev sorts the problem but does not persist after a restart (/dev created on the fly presumably, I'm new to ubuntu, not linux). Any help
if that's the way you'd like to solve it, you could always put something like... "ln -s /dev/scd0 /dev/dvd" in /etc/rc.local
Then again.. I'm sure it's configurable in Xine
actually I figure it has to be configurable in xine, just not figured it out yet and was kinda hoping someone might know off hand
